channel.title: CopyToClipboard

item.title: CopyToClipboard
item.dc:creator: @FrostFyr FrostFÿr
item.description:
@FrostFyr wrote:

Hello again all, i’m back with another problem, I’m trying to make a form that when you press each button it’ll type what you want to the selected client, i prefer the C+P method of typing since it’s faster, but it won’t copy from my TEdit, it just pastes what i had copied previously.

Here is the code, only the procedure i’m having trouble with, if you want the full thing gimmeh a heads up.

procedure CnP(Str:String); begin ActivateClient; Wait(200); Edit1.Text := Str; Edit1.CopyToClipboard; KeyDown(17);//ctrl KeyDown(86);//v Wait(15); KeyUp(86); KeyUp(17); KeyDown(13);//Enter Wait(15); KeyUp(13); end;
And ty in advance for your help.

Read full topic
